articles.title: ECB's Knot says inflation warnings not yet priced in - Reuters
articles.description: European Central Bank (ECB) governing council member Klaas Knot said on Monday that markets seem to be underestimating the risk that inflation will be higher than models are predicting.
articles.content: AMSTERDAM, Oct 10 (Reuters) - European Central Bank (ECB) governing council member Klaas Knot said on Monday that markets seem to be underestimating the risk that inflation will be higher than models… [+1494 chars]

articles.title: RMH shareholders to get a large dividend - Moneyweb
articles.description: Proceeds of Atterbury Europe disposal and distribution of excess capital returns nearly R2bn to shareholders.
articles.content: The sudden dive in the share price of RMB Holdings (RMH) wasn’t unexpected. The nearly 70% drop from R1.96 to 60 cents last Wednesday (5 October) happened because it was the last day to trade in the … [+6841 chars]
